main event: An observer noticed a peculiar light that disturbed his TV, describing it as having a dome with protrusions on the top and bottom.
interesting points: The observer reported that the light hovered and moved in irregular patterns., The observer called his father to witness the unusual movements., The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes before the light disappeared into the distance., The object was observed in the vicinity of Lockborne AFB., The conclusion of the report indicated insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: a peculiar light with a dome
